steps.description: fill-up college entrance exam application form
instructions: proceed to testing room for examination
after the exam, wait for the results

steps.description: fill-up clearance form then proceed to icct clinic for physical checkup
submit clearance form along with the following documents
instructions: original copy of good moral certificate

steps.description: proceed to registrar window 1 and get tentative schedule/subjects
proceed to course adviser (degree/non-degree) at the gym for checking of schedule and subjects. (bring tentative form & grade slip)
then proceed to the following offices
